title: Waiver Wire! So Many WRs This Week (09/29 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We may not have a high-profile RB injury this week, but that doesn't mean there aren't a lot of good options on the waiver wire. Before we get to that, who are our Top 5 QBs rest of season? Is Lamar Jackson still Top 5? Then we'll tell you our top waiver wire priorities (3:50) and how much FAB to spend. Myles Gaskin, Jeff Wilson and Justin Jefferson are among the big names this week ... Injuries, news and notes (13:38) and then our Top 3 waiver wire options at QB (16:00), RB (18:30), WR (21:05), TE (28:15) plus DST and K. And we recap KC-BAL (35:00) and wonder what's going on with the Ravens RBs and Marquise Brown ... Dropometer (41:00)! Then a quick round of Team Name Tuesday (42:40) and finally a lengthier look at the waiver wire at each position (43:35). Is Ryan Fitzpatrick going to have a huge week? Any love for Hunter Renfrow? Adrian Peterson?... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Listen to the brand new Fantasy Football Today in 5 podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/fantasy-football-today-in-5/id1528634304
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow the new FFT Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/FFToday
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCviK78rIWXhZdFzJ1Woi7Fg/videos
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/

itunes:title: Waiver Wire! So Many WRs This Week (09/29 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: There are about 15-20 WRs we could make a case for! Plus Myles Gaskin, Jeff Wilson, Dalton Schultz, Mecole Hardman and many more. Oh, and we give our Top 5 QBs rest of season and the results may surprise you!
